hanzi-su-wiki:
綱

Значения

Верёвка, канат; основы

Мнемоника

Верёвка 糸 как основа для преодоления гор и холмов 岡.

Варианты

纲

gāng
head rope of a fishing net; guiding principle; key link; class (taxonomy); outline; program
головной трос рыболовной сети; Руководящим принципом; ключевое звено; класс (таксономия); контур; программа
rtega_mnemonic:
綱綱RS
纲纲		heavy rope, hawser, main points
  • net 岡/冈 of strings 糸 makes up a heavy rope
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 纲)
Antonyms: 目
Pictophonetic: 岡 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
綱要 [ gāng yào ]: outline; essential points
綱領 [ gāng lǐng ]: program (i.e. plan of action); guiding principle

• ⿰ Left to right

heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman likes hiking and following guidelines to the ridge of a hill where he can get a great view. &nbsp
koohiiStory1: A sturdy thread is equally obviously hawser (heavy rope). (see previous frame).
koohiiStory2: Spiderman saves Japan from floating away by tying Mt. Fuji to mainland Asia using a hawser made of web.
jp_example_words:
横綱(よこづな): sumo grand champion
綱(つな): rope
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you take a thread and wrap up a bunch of it, so much it becomes a hill of thread, you're going to have a lot of thread. You can wrap some of that thread around other thread to create a much thicker thread. This thread is a cable.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself twisting this hill of thread up to make thicker cables. They're strong!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You use this cable to swing down from a building but you need to do it soon (つな)! You're being chased by some bad guys and they've almost caught you, so if you're gonna swing to safety with this cable, you need to do it soon.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Gotta do it soon. Imagine swinging from this cable and feeling the wind in your hair.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 岡 (おか、コウ холм). Не путать: 鋼 (はがね、コウ сталь), 網 (あみ、モウ сеть).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 山 (гора), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 岡 (холм)
Ru_trainchinese: gāng: (сущ) основные тезисы, программа; (биол.) класс
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a hill (岡) of thread (糸) is a rope
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It's convenient for Spidey to travel to difficult to reach places like the ridge of a hill, so he can go their for even normal activities like reading the guidelines of his new gadget he got from the Apple Store.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " Oka " sound. The original meaning is the main rope of the net. "Shu Wen": "Gang, Wei Hong Sheng Ye." Duan Yucai changed to "Wang Hong Ye", the note said: "The Hong, the Guan Wei Ye, the extension is the guardian of everyone. Kong Ying Dayun: "The Hong , The rope of the net."" Such as "Shang Shu. On Pan Geng: "If the net is in the outline, it is methodical." "Mo Zi. "Shang Tongzhong": "For example, like a silk thread, there is discipline, but the injustice has a key." "Lv's Spring and Autumn. "Yong Min": "There are disciplines and outlines for the use of people. One draws its discipline, and all eyes rise, and one draws its outline, all eyes are open."

"Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "If you turn on the fur collar, you can stop it with five fingers, and you will be innumerable." "Han Feizi. "Foreign Reserve said lower right": "A person who is good at opening a net quotes the outline, if one captures ten thousand eyes and then gets it, it will be hard work; quote the outline, and the fish is already in the bag." The idiom "Outline outline and guide" takes one of the two books. It means lifting the main rope of the fishing net and grabbing the collar of the clothes to metaphor the key to grabbing things. Such as the Southern Song Dynasty Zhu Xi "Zhu Wen Gong Collection. Volume seventy-five. Xie Shangcai's Quotations Post Preface: "The fifty-fifth chapter of the first chapter of Hu's first chapter contains Wendinggong Q&A, which is not available in his book, and the outline and the guide instruct scholars to work hard, which is beyond the reach of his book. "Guangya Shuzheng" also said: "When you use the net, you must mention its outline, and the clothing must be worn."

" Outline " by extension indicates the general essence of things. Such as "Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "The people of "Ritual" are divided into the law, and the class is the discipline. Therefore, the study is only the "Rite" and stops." "Huainanzi. "Thai": "The way of five emperors and three kings, the rule of the world, the instrument of governance." "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Ming Poetry": "Therefore, you can observe the generations, but the number of changes in sentiment can be monitored; the summary is the same and different, but the outline of the program can be clear."

" Gang " also means law and law. Such as "Historical Records. Biography of the Marquis of Huaiyin: "Qin Zhigang is exquisite and relaxed, Shandong is disturbed, different surnames rise together, handsome Wuji." "Han Shu. "Wang Mang's First Biography": "The ruling government collapses, the discipline is abolished, and the disaster is perilous. It is not like a tunnel." "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "The Legend of Wu Lord": "Heaven descends into chaos, the emperor's guide is lost, and the rebellious officials use provocations to rob the country. It began with Dong Zhuo and finally Cao Cao"

" Tang " also refers to an organization that transported goods in batches in ancient times. Such as "New Tang Book. "Shihuo Zhi": "(Liu) Yan is the Xiejiazhijiang River with two thousand ships, each receiving a thousand Hus, ten ships are the key, each group has 300 people, and the bamboo worker is fifty." "Water Margin" Chapter 16 "If you and I have a birthday plan, I will praise you." Huang Zongxi of the Qing Dynasty, "Ming Yi to be visited." "Cai Ji I": "For more than two hundred years, the world has gold and silver, and it has been transported to Yanjing, like water to gully."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to " Oka " sound. The original meaning is the main rope of the net.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「岡」聲。本義是網的主繩。《說文》：「綱，維紘繩也。」段玉裁改為「网紘也」，注曰：「紘者，冠維也，引伸之為凡維系之偁。孔穎達云：『紘者，网之大繩。』」如《尚書．盤庚上》：「若網在綱，有條而不紊。」《墨子．尚同中》：「譬之若絲縷之有紀，而罔罟之有綱也。」《呂氏春秋．用民》：「用民有紀有綱，壹引其紀，萬目皆起，壹引其綱，萬目皆張。」

　　《荀子．勸學》：「若挈裘領，詘五指而頓之，順者不可勝數也。」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「善張網者引其綱，若一一攝萬目而後得，則是勞而難；引其綱，而魚已囊矣。」成語「提綱挈領」取兩書之意，以提起魚網的總繩、抓住衣服的領子，比喻抓住事物的關鍵。如南宋朱熹《朱文公文集．卷七十五．謝上蔡語錄後序》：「胡氏上篇五十五章，記文定公問答，皆他書所無有，而提綱挈領，指示學者用力處，亦卓然非他書所及。」王念孫《廣雅疏證》亦有云：「舉網必提其綱，振衣必挈其領。」

　　「綱」引申表示事物的總要。如《荀子．勸學》：「《禮》者，法之大分，類之綱紀也，故學至乎《禮》而止矣。」《淮南子．泰族》：「五帝三王之道，天下之綱紀，治之儀表也。」《文心雕龍．明詩》：「故鋪觀列代，而情變之數可監；撮舉同異，而綱領之要可明矣。」

　　「綱」亦表示法度、法紀。如《史記．淮陰侯列傳》：「秦之綱絕而維弛，山東大擾，異姓並起，英俊烏集。」《漢書．王莽傳上》：「朝政崩壞，綱紀廢弛，危亡之禍，不隧如髮。」《三國志．吳書．吳主傳》：「天降喪亂，皇綱失敘，逆臣乘釁，劫奪國柄，始於董卓，終於曹操」

　　「綱」還表示古代成批運送貨物的組織。如《新唐書．食貨志》：「（劉）晏為歇艎支江船二千艘，每船受千斛，十船為綱，每綱三百人，篙工五十。」《水滸傳》第16回：「你若與我送得生辰綱去，我自有抬舉你處。」清黃宗羲《明夷待訪錄．財計一》：「二百餘年，天下金銀，綱運至于燕京，如水赴壑。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「岡」聲。本義是網的主繩。

gang1
HSK 4: 剛,刚,钢,鋼
HSK 5: 纲,綱
HSK 6: 扛,杠
綱綱RS
纲纲 		heavy rope, hawser, main points
  • net 岡/冈 of strings 糸 makes up a heavy rope
(Simplified: 纲)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 目
Pictophonetic: 岡 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 岡 [ gāng ] ridge or crest of hill
①提網的總繩。
②事物的關鍵部分：大綱。綱領。綱目。綱要(a。提綱；b。概要)。
③中國從唐代起轉運大批貨物所行的辦法：一綱(把貨物分批運行，每批車輛船隻的計數編號)。花石綱。生辰綱。
④生物學分類的一種類別(生物學把同一門的生物按照彼此相似的特徵和親緣關係再分成若干羣，每一羣爲“一綱”，“綱”以下再分爲“目”)。
⑤統治者認爲維持正常秩序的必不可少的行爲規範：綱紀。綱常(“三綱”、“五常”的簡稱，是一種封建道德)。朝(cháo)綱(統治集團內部應遵守的法紀)。
綱要 [ gāng yào ]: outline; essential points
綱領 [ gāng lǐng ]: program (i.e. plan of action); guiding principle
(Simplified: 纲)

綱字的基本解释

綱
gāng
见“纲”。

綱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāng］
［《廣韻》古郎切，平唐，見。］
“纲1”的繁体字。
(1)提网的总绳。
(2)事物的总要。
(3)纲维；法度。
(4)引申为符合法度。
(5)引申为约束、治理。
(6)古代系侯（箭靶）于植之绳。
(7)引申为系束。
(8)旧时成批运输货物的组织。
(9)用作量词。批。
(10)行列。
(11)指州郡主簿。
(12)生物分类系统上所用的等级之一。把同一门生物按照彼此相似的特征和亲缘关系再分为几个群叫做“綱”。如苔藓植物门分为苔纲和藓纲，脊椎动物亚门分为鱼、鸟、哺乳等纲。纲以下为目。

綱字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綱； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页927第24
〔古文〕㭃?【廣韻】古郞切【集韻】【韻會】居郞切，?音岡。【說文】維紘繩也。【書·盤庚】若網在綱，有條而不紊。【詩·大雅】綱紀四方。【傳】張之爲綱。【疏】綱者，網之大繩。　又【儀禮·鄕射禮】乃張侯下綱。【註】綱，持舌繩也。【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】梓人爲侯上綱與下綱，出舌尋，絹寸焉。【註】綱，所以繫侯於植者也。　又【禮·緯含文嘉】君爲臣綱，父爲子綱，夫爲妻綱。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】梓人爲侯上綱與下綱，出舌尋，䋶寸焉。〕　謹照原文䋶寸改絹寸。
綱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
綱字的起名意思

暂无。

gāng
See "Outline".
Class
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāng］
["Guangyun" Gu Langqie, Ping Tang, see you. ]
The traditional characters of "統1".
(1) The main rope of the net.
(2) The general essence of things.
(3) Gangwei; law degree.
(4) The extension is in line with the law.
(5) It is extended to restraint and governance.
(6) The ancient tie Hou (arrow target) Yu Zhizhi rope.
(7) The extension is bound.
(8) The old organization of bulk transportation of goods.
(9) Used as a quantifier. Batch.
(10) The ranks.
(11) Refers to the book of the county and county owners
(12) One of the levels used in the biological classification system. The same creatures are divided into several groups according to their similar characteristics and kinship, called "gangs". For example, the phylum bryophytes is divided into classes of mosses and mosses, and the subphylum of vertebrates is divided into classes such as fish, birds, and mammals. Below the outline is the purpose.

Name meaning
Nothing.
gāng
вм. 纲
Radicals: 糸, 岡  (thread, hill)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you take a thread and wrap up a bunch of it, so much it becomes a hill of thread, you're going to have a lot of thread. You can wrap some of that thread around other thread to create a much thicker thread. This thread is a cable.
Imagine yourself twisting this hill of thread up to make thicker cables. They're strong!
Reading Mnemonic
You use this cable to swing down from a building but you need to do it soon (つな)! You're being chased by some bad guys and they've almost caught you, so if you're gonna swing to safety with this cable, you need to do it soon.
Gotta do it soon. Imagine swinging from this cable and feeling the wind in your hair.

Examples: 綱 (つな)
一 (один), 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 山 (гора), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 岡 (холм)
Фонетик: 岡 (おか、コウ холм). Не путать: 鋼 (はがね、コウ сталь), 網 (あみ、モウ сеть).
